pages.text: $(li)The Deep Frozen Ocean is a variant of the Ocean biome.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The surface of this biome is composed mainly by Gravel.$(br)$(li)No type of vegetation can grows in this Biome.

$(li)No too many aquatic animals can withstand the hard conditions of this sea.$(br)$(li)Only Squids, Blobfishes and Frilled Sharks can be found here.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Deep Frozen Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
